title: Sell Scotch
metaDescription: Sell your scotch whisky collection to Proof Cellars. We buy Macallan, rare single malts, and limited editions. Direct offers with no fees.
heroSubhead: We buy scotch whisky directly - from rare single malts to full collections.
introParagraph: From rare Macallan releases to vintage single malts and limited editions, we purchase scotch whisky directly with no consignment fees. Submit photos and details of your bottles, receive an offer typically within one business day, and get paid after we verify your items.
whatWeBuy: Macallan aged expressions and limited editions
Rare and vintage single malt scotch
Age-stated single malts from premium distilleries
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bottles with compromised seals or signs of tampering
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
photoChecklist: Front label showing distillery, age, and expression
Back label with batch or cask information
Fill level visible in the bottle
Original box, tube, or presentation case
conditionFactors: Fill level should be appropriate for the bottle's age - some evaporation is normal for older bottles
Seal integrity is critical - cork condition and capsule must show no signs of tampering
Label condition matters - vintage bottles may show age-appropriate wear
Original packaging significantly impacts value for many collectible releases
Provenance and storage history add value when documented
Cask information and bottling details help verify authenticity
pricingFactors: Distillery reputation and region (Speyside, Islay, Highland, etc.)
Cask type and finishing (sherry, bourbon, wine casks)

faqs.question: What scotch distilleries do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy collectible scotch from distilleries including Macallan, Springbank, Ardbeg, Lagavulin, Bowmore, and many others. Contact us with your specific bottles.

faqs.question: Do you buy Japanese whisky?
faqs.answer: Yes. We buy collectible Japanese whisky including Yamazaki, Hibiki, Hakushu, and other sought-after expressions. See our Japanese whisky page for details.

faqs.question: How do you evaluate older scotch bottles?
faqs.answer: We consider fill level, label condition, seal integrity, and provenance. Some evaporation is expected in older bottles. Send photos and we will assess.

faqs.question: Does the original box or tube add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original packaging adds significant value for many collectible scotch releases. Include photos of any boxes, tubes, or presentation cases.

faqs.question: What if my bottle is from a closed distillery?
faqs.answer: Bottles from closed or silent distilleries are often collectible. Send photos and details and we will evaluate based on current demand.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day. For larger collections or unusual bottles, evaluation may take slightly longer.

faqs.question: Do you buy blended scotch?
faqs.answer: We focus on single malts and rare blends. Common blended scotch typically does not meet our criteria, but limited editions and older blends may be considered.

faqs.question: Can I sell scotch from any state?
faqs.answer: We can only purchase where legally permitted. We will confirm whether we can proceed based on your location after reviewing your submission.
